# Ex04 Places Around Me
## Date: 

## AIM
To develop a website to display details about the places around my house.

## DESIGN STEPS

### STEP 1
Create a Django admin interface.

### STEP 2
Download your city map from Google.

### STEP 3
Using ```<map>``` tag name the map.

### STEP 4
Create clickable regions in the image using ```<area>``` tag.

### STEP 5
Write HTML programs for all the regions identified.

### STEP 6
Execute the programs and publish them.

## CODE
```
home.html
<!-- Image Map Generated by http://www.image-map.net/ -->
<img src="Screenshot 2025-12-15 220642.png" usemap="#image-map">

<map name="image-map">
    <area target="" alt="temple" title="temple" href="temple.html" coords="342,263,534,359" shape="rect">
    <area target="" alt="hotel" title="hotel" href="hotel.html" coords="535,88,704,146" shape="rect">
    <area target="" alt="elite" title="elite" href="elite.html" coords="682,506,849,560" shape="rect">
</map>

elite.html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Hotel Elite Park - Tirupati</title>
</head>
<body>
    <IMG SRC="elite.jpg" HEIGHT="500" WIDTH="1000" BORDER="6">
    <h1>About Hotel Elite Park in Tirupati</h1>
    <p>Hotel Elite Park is a mid-range hotel located in Tirupati, Andhra Pradesh, India. Situated near the Tirumala Venkateswara Temple, it offers comfortable accommodation for pilgrims and tourists, with easy access to the sacred site.</p>
    <h2>Amenities</h2>
    <ul>
        <li>Well-furnished rooms with modern amenities</li>
        <li>24-hour front desk and room service</li>
        <li>Free Wi-Fi throughout the property</li>
        <li>Multi-cuisine restaurant and cafe</li>
        <li>Parking facilities and travel desk</li>
    </ul>
    <h2>Location</h2>
    <p>Address: Near RTC Bus Stand, Tirupati, Andhra Pradesh 517501, India</p>
    <p>Contact: Phone - +91-XXXX-XXXXXX | Email - info@elitepark.com</p>
    <p>For reservations and more information, visit the official website or contact directly.</p>
</body>
</html>
hotel.html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Hotel Vihas - Tirupati</title>
</head>
<body>
    <IMG SRC="images.jpg" HEIGHT="500" WIDTH="1000" BORDER="6">
    <h1>About Hotel Vihas in Tirupati</h1>
    <p>Hotel Vihas is a budget-friendly accommodation located in Tirupati, Andhra Pradesh, India. It is conveniently situated near the Tirumala Venkateswara Temple, making it ideal for pilgrims and tourists visiting the sacred site.</p>
    <h2>Amenities</h2>
    <ul>
        <li>Comfortable rooms with basic facilities</li>
        <li>24-hour front desk service</li>
        <li>Free Wi-Fi</li>
        <li>On-site dining options</li>
        <li>Parking available</li>
    </ul>
    <h2>Location</h2>
    <p>Address: Near RTC Bus Stand, Tirupati, Andhra Pradesh 517501, India</p>
    <p>Contact: Phone - +91-XXXX-XXXXXX | Email - info@hotelvihas.com</p>
    <p>For bookings and more details, visit the official website or contact directly.</p>
</body>
</html>
temple.html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Tirumala Venkateswara Temple - Tirupati</title>
</head>
<body>
    <IMG SRC="temple.jpg" HEIGHT="500" WIDTH="1000" BORDER="6">
    <h1>About Tirumala Venkateswara Temple in Tirupati</h1>
    <p>The Tirumala Venkateswara Temple, also known as Tirupati Balaji Temple, is a Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Venkateswara, an incarnation of Vishnu. Located in Tirupati, Andhra Pradesh, India, it is one of the most visited religious sites in the world, attracting millions of pilgrims annually.</p>
    <h2>History</h2>
    <p>The temple's origins date back to ancient times, with references in Hindu scriptures. It has been a center of worship for centuries, evolving through various dynasties and renovations.</p>
    <h2>Significance</h2>
    <p>Devotees believe that visiting the temple and offering prayers brings prosperity, peace, and fulfillment of wishes. The temple is renowned for its architectural beauty and spiritual aura.</p>
    <h2>Location</h2>
    <p>Address: Tirumala Hills, Tirupati, Andhra Pradesh 517504, India</p>
    <p>Contact: Phone - +91-XXXX-XXXXXX | Website - tirumala.org</p>
    <p>For darshan timings and more details, visit the official website or contact the temple authorities.</p>
</body>
</html>
```

The program for implementing image maps using HTML is executed successfully.
